title: TN_SC_BOX Function Module
description:
TN_SC_BOX is used to draw a rectangular area, that is flled 

with the specifed character in Iby_FILL. With parameter Iby_ATTR fll color 

can be specifed. The fll area is drawn with a border that is given by 

Iin_BORDER.

Border types:

0 = no border

1 = frame with a single line

2 = frame double line

3 = frame with spaces
name: TN_SC_BOX

input.name: Iby_ATTR
input.description: Color code to fill the area

in/out.name: Xus_TN_SCREEN
in/out.description: Screen structure for displaying the drawn box
